unnormalised: Tumchem kallzachem borem, pollounk zata, fakt chaha pivun sorkaracher tokli marpi purnnea mama lokanchem nhoi. Tumim legit, moga vachpe, bhogunk xokta! Cardiology, hea mhotvachea angachea vixoyacher adharit, fakt ECGs ani stethoscopes nhoi. Tem tickerk borem dourunk ani khuxi korunk zata, eka bore tel dil'lea auto-rickshaw engine bhaxen. Ani ami fuddar korunk zata, ami sobea diwali vellar sasumaim bhaxe bhogunk xokta, ani ami sobea diwali vellar sasumaim bhaxe bhogunk xokta. AIIMS Delhi-chea Dr. Sharma-n eka vellar mhaka sanglem, "Majea ardea patientancher kallzak mithai pasun kel'le assa. Tem nhoi!"
normalised: Kalzachi toxtekai, tumi polleat, fokot chai piyen ani sorkaracher tokrar kortolea tornattea kaka khatir na. Tumui, mogache vachpa, toxentuch! Cardiology, hea jivitachi xikxa, fokot E-C-G ani stethoscopach na. Tem hea tickerak khuxalkayen tikan dovrunk, zoxem eka bore tel laillea auto-rickshaw engine. Ani ami polleun gheum, amche bhogtan amche kalza Diwali-yer amchea sasranddai-yer thavn odik vait vagtay. Doctor Sharma, A-I-I-M-S Delhi-yer ek pavtim mhaka sangllem, "Majea adhea rogean mandle ki tanchem kalza mithai-yer dhaklam. Te na!"

unnormalised: Tech khatir, tumchea arteries-ank kitem addaun zata khorab Bollywood sequel-ank poros? Poilem mhollear, samosas. Oh, godd ani tel'la samosas! Jeunchena asun, dor ekok tumchea coronary arteries-ancher deep-fried deposit zata. Dusrem mhollear, stress. Mumbai-n parking mellounk poddta tem monisacher heart attack diunk purem zata, office-chi rajkorn choloit astana. Indian Heart Journal-ant zalli study, Vol. 68, sangta ki stress-induce cardiomyopathy chalu asa, vishesh korun software engineers je ratri bhair ravtat. Ani 24x7 news cycle visrunk nhoi… Arnab Goswami chikta tem pollounk zata cardio bhaxe (khorab prakar).
normalised: Mogachem, kite bharti-yer Bollywood sequelan thavn odik dhul kartat? Poilem, samosa. Oh, mov, chiknnea samosa! Te ruchik astanam, pratek ek amchea coronary artient eka deep-fried deposit bhaxen. Dusrem, dukh. Mumbai-er parkink-achi suvat sodhunk piran soglleank kalzache dhuke diunk purat, office rajkaronacher deal korunk bhov bhair. Indian Heart Journal, Volume sixty eight-er eka shodeant dhokloleachem cardiomyopathi khub vaddlole, khas software engineeran madhye ratrichem kam kartolean modhye. Ani ami twenty four by seven news cycle visrunk na… Arnab Goswami chikhtollem polleun, cardiacho ek nirdhar asunk shakleat (vait torecho).

unnormalised: Atam, thoddi kallzak bori umedi (karann tumim hasunk na zalear, tumim rodtele… ani tem tumchem blood pressure vaddaita!). Tumchem kalliz eka jirddya hatti bhaxe vichar korat. Tumim taka marathon dhavunk sangunk zaina. Tumim taka sove choleache dhavnek, thodde hallke yoga-k sangunk zai (tessa lassi pielea uprant shirsa nhoi!), ani ghee-chi balt'li ditolo zalear, bhitor ditolo. Ugddas asha tumchea cousine-n eka mhoinea khatir Goa-k vottnne ditolo kallzak, durt kortolea vorsa uprant? Tumchea cardiologist, Dr. Iyer, khuxi naslo. Ti bodlek bhitor vinchlea pordhesochea vindaloo-k ani vegim cholpak sanglem.
normalised: Atam, kalza-toxtekainchem hasya (karann tumi haslen na, tumi rotat... ani te tumchea roktan vaddtay!). Tumchem kalza eka ziddi hatti bhaxen manun ghe. Tumi fokot marathon dukhavunk sanghunk shaknat. Tumkam eka sovashir chali, thoddem yoga (te tisri lassi kel'lea uprant shirsa na!), ani nakki ghee-chi eka balti khavchok na. Tumkam yat asta ki mhojea soirean taka visraun eka mahinea khatir Goa-k zait bharti divunk prayatn kelem? Ami sanghunk divat ki tache cardiologistan, Doctor Iyeran, khuxal nasle. Tean eka toxteka devaschi riti suchyellem jenant kam beachside vindaloo ani odik chikani chalink asle.

unnormalised: Punn tumi seriously ghevun tumchem borem pomp sambhallat. Thodde nimanne dhondhe bhitor ghalat, thodde halun bhair vhorunk asat, auto gheunk portun cholunk portun cholta tea bhaxe. Tumchea bhaji khait, tumchea ajechea biryani itle khuxal naslear legit. Ani borem zaunk, meditate korunk xika! 10 minutes-chea unddeacho khuxalkar tumchea kallzak 1 Crore-cho lottery jeunk poros chodd khuxi korunk xokta. Hea article-ank tumchea borenk lagichea kallzacho nagg, tumchea borem sambhallunk ugddas dourat, tannem strike korun magnem patounk korunk karar korlear.
normalised: Pun satyant, lokam, te molachem pumpha dixtt ghea. Thoddi niyamit kariavam bharti kora, auto gheuchek thavn dusri chai stall-k chalunk bhari. Tumchem bhajye khaat, tumchea aji bai-che biryani thavn odik bharti nasleat. Ani dukh bhair, dhyan learn kora! Dasha minutes-antlea dukh thavn tumchem kalza eka crore rupeachea lotterian jitlen thavn odik khuxalkayen astolen. Hem lekhan tumchea sobatchea kalzachem nag bhaxen manun ghe, tumchea koden tumchea bhogtan vait vaglolen thavn poilem te dixtt gheunka ani eka lekhanant dhokla divunk vata.

unnormalised: Ekdam sodd, tumchea fuddlea birthday-k vo diwali-k bodli korunk ravunk nhoi. Tumchea lagichea cardiologist-ak checkup korunk book korat (Dr. Patel, chodd borem!), malak zaun suru korat, ani tumchea borem kalliz ek khuxal kalliz zata tem ugddas dourat. Ani ek khuxal kalliz tumim khorab Bollywood filmank hasunk chodd vorsa ditolo, chai-cher rajkorn vad vadunk ditolo, ani tumi kednaim bhitor (chodd nhoi!) samosa ditolo. Tumchem kalliz, fuddarak, thoddi Bollywood drama zai, cardiac arrest-ant bodlenk lagunk zaina ti nhoi. Date of publication: 24/10/2024.
normalised: Nimann, tumchea adlea jivak vo Diwali-k thoddi challe bharti korchea khatir vatuch na. Tumchea lagichea cardiologista-yer checkup book kora (majea Doctor Patel, khub suchyola!), nheslear xuruvat kara, ani yat dovra ki eka toxteka kalzachem khuxalkayen astolen. Ani eka khuxalkayen kalzachem tumkam bad Bollywood filmacher hasunk, chai-yer rajkaronacher vad korunk, ani ho, tumkam ek pavtim (pun punji nakho!) samosa-yer bharti diunk odik jivak jitlem voim ditalen. Tumchem kalzam, eka Bollywood dramachen dixtt ghetlen, pun te dhokle bhartint cardiac arrest-yer nimann voichok na. Date of publication: twenty fourth october two thousand and twenty four.
